column4: why would i get a systemload of 6+ when copying files from a pata drive to a sata drive? the pata drive has dma enabled, rest of the system is essentially idle.
not a big load for this
well when it causes text input into a terminal session to lag by multiple seconds, i'd call that a slight issue..
i got same loads when i copy big file
try to bench hd, with sudo hdparm -Tt /dev/hda
seems fine.. good speeds for a pata drive
the cache reads are a bit down, but it's still fine
did u use nautilus to copy ?
try to copy with cp or rsync
doing it now, a little increase in load but nothing huge
